00036 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00037 require_once('../lib/view.php');
00038 
00039 class Openvpn extends View
00040 {
00041     public $Model= 'openvpn';
00042     public $Layout= 'openvpn';
00043     
00044     function Openvpn()
00045     {
00046         $this->LogsHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Messages from all OpenVPN processes are recorded in the same log file.');
00047         $this->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Sample client and server configuration are provided to get you started. You may want to replace the default SSL certificates with yours.');
00048     }
00049 
00054     function SetConfig($file)
00055     {
00056         global $ViewConfigName, $ClientConfig, $ServerConfig;
00057 
00058         if (isset($file)) {
00059             $_SESSION[$this->Model][basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'])]['ConfFile']= $file;
00060             
00061             if ($this->Controller($output, 'IsClientConf', $file)) {
00062                 $this->Config= $ClientConfig;
00063             }
00064             else {
00065                 $this->Config= $ServerConfig;
00066             }
00067             $ViewConfigName= $file;
00068         }
00069     }
00070 
00075     function ConfSelectForm($module)
00076     {
00077         global $ConfigFile;
00078 
00079         $deleteconfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to delete the configuration?');
00080 
00081         if ($this->Controller($conffiles, 'GetConfs')) {
00082             ?>
00083             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00084                 <select name="ConfFile">
00085                 <?php
00086                 $conffileexists= FALSE;
00087                 foreach ($conffiles as $file) {
00088                     $selected= '';
00089                     if ($ConfigFile === basename($file)) {
00090                         $selected= ' selected';
00091                         $conffileexists= TRUE;
00092                     }
00093                     ?>
00094                     <option value="<?php echo basename($file) ?>"<?php echo $selected ?>><?php echo basename($file) ?></option>
00095                     <?php
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 if (!$conffileexists && (count($conffiles) > 0)) {
00099                     $ConfigFile= basename($conffiles[0]);
00100                     $this->SetConfig($ConfigFile);
00101                 }
00102                 ?>
00103                 </select>
00104                 <input type="submit" name="Select" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Select') ?>"/>
00105                 <br />
00106                 <input type="submit" name="Delete" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $deleteconfirm ?>')"/>
00107                 <br />
00108                 <input type="text" name="CopyTo" style="width: 150px;" maxlength="100" value="<?php echo basename($ConfigFile) ?>"/>
00109                 <input type="submit" name="Copy" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Copy') ?>"/>
00110             </form>
00111             <?php
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00117     function ConfStartStopForm()
00118     {
00119         global $Modules;
00120 
00121         $startconfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to start the <NAME>?');
00122         $startconfirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$this->Model]['Name']), $startconfirm);
00123 
00124         $stopconfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to stop the <NAME>?');
00125         $stopconfirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$this->Model]['Name']), $stopconfirm);
00126 
00127         if ($this->Controller($conffiles, 'GetConfs')) {
00128             ?>
00129             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00130                 <select name="ConfFiles[]" multiple style="width: 150px; height: 100px;">
00131                     <?php
00132                     foreach ($conffiles as $file) {
00133                         ?>
00134                         <option value="<?php echo basename($file) ?>"><?php echo basename($file) ?></option>
00135                         <?php
00136                     }
00137                     ?>
00138                 </select>
00139                 <br />
00140                 <input type="submit" name="Start" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Start') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $startconfirm ?>')"/>
00141                 <input type="submit" name="Stop" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Stop') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $stopconfirm ?>')"/>
00142             </form>
00143             <?php
00144         }
00145     }
